name: RetrieveGroupMemberships
description:
Fetch members of a specified group.

Retrieves all the members of a specified group. This tool should be called when you need to get a list of users in a group. Note that access is restricted to members of the group or users with admin-level permissions.

parameters.name: group_identifier
parameters.description: The unique ID of the group to fetch its members. Only members or admins can access this.

parameters.name: max_items_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of members to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: response_offset
parameters.description: The starting point for retrieving members. Must not exceed 10000 to avoid errors.

value_schema.description:
The offset of the item at which to begin the response.

Queries with offset parameter value
exceeding 10000 will be rejected
with a 400 response.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the box API.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of items to return per page.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description:
The offset of the item at which to begin the response.

Queries with offset parameter value
exceeding 10000 will be rejected
with a 400 response.

value_schema.description:
The offset of the item at which to begin the response.

Queries with offset parameter value
exceeding 10000 will be rejected
with a 400 response.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
